common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this API to get Shop level CPC ads multiple-days daily performance.

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Wrong parameters.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Something wrong. Please try later.

error_list.name: ads.api.http_method_not_allowed
error_list.description: Only the supported HTTP method for the API is allowed.

error_list.name: ads.performance.error_date_in_future
error_list.description: The date must be today or earlier than today up to 6 months ago.

error_list.name: ads.performance.error_date_range_too_long
error_list.description: Date range can't be longer than 1 month.

error_list.name: ads.performance.error_date_too_old
error_list.description: The date can't be earlier than 6 months ago.

error_list.name: ads.performance.error_same_start_end_dates
error_list.description: Start date can't be equal to end date. For single date's hourly performance data, please query hourly api.

error_list.name: ads.performance.error_start_later_than_end
error_list.description: The start date can't be later than the end date.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_partner_api
error_list.description: Too many requests, please reduce the request rate and try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_shop_api
error_list.description: Too many requests for the shop at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_api
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: parse data failed

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: data not exist

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: parameter invalid

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Something wrong. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_shop
error_list.description: shopid is invalid

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: request not from gateway

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

This is the parameter to indicate the start date of the time length of performance.

","name":"start_date","sample":"17-03-2021","type":"string","required":"True","key":"eScyMwQ"},{"description":"

This is the parameter to indicate the end date of the time length of performance

","name":"end_date","sample":"18-03-2021","type":"string","required":"True","key":"efGhBd"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Error code, empty when no error returned

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kCNJaT"},{"description":"

error description

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jQDFMje"},{"description":"

If some data cannot respond normally, set the warning

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NQbhnk"},{"description":"

request id is unique for each request

","name":"request_id","sample":"6f235f4a343e4feb8a9ed74c439f6663","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ebfErh"},{"description":"

response body

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"rrhktKH","children":[{"description":"

This is the parameter to indicate which date the performance record belongs to.

","name":"date","sample":"17-03-2021","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DwYTXdC"},{"description":"

Number of times buyers see ads

","name":"impression","sample":"123456","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"CQwGQnT"},{"description":"

Total number of clicks on the Ad

","name":"clicks","sample":"123456","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"xSbNDnW"},{"description":"

Ctr, click-through rate measures how often shoppers who see an ad end up clicking it. CTR = Clicks / Impressions

","name":"ctr","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ytyfY"},{"description":"

Buyer place an order within 7 days after clicking on the ads (item gets purchased from the clicked ads)

Please kindly note that the direct_order in the API reflected to Seller Center - Shopee Ads Module FE is Direct Conversions.

","name":"direct_order","sample":"123456","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"DHhMeyc"},{"description":"

Buyer place an order within 7 days after clicking on the ads; (the item gets purchased as long as there are other items from the same shops got click.)

Please kindly note that the broad_order in the API reflected to Seller Center - Shopee Ads Module FE is Conversions.

","name":"broad_order","sample":"123456","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"XrEtmbp"},{"description":"

Ad orders / total number of clicks on the Ad. (item gets purchased from the clicked ads.)

Please kindly note that the direct_conversions in the API reflected to Seller Center - Shopee Ads Module FE is Direct Conversions Rate.

","name":"direct_conversions","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"WaXwwDF"},{"description":"

Ad orders / total number of clicks on the Ad. (the item gets purchased as long as there are other items from the same shops got click.)

Please kindly note that the broad_conversions in the API reflected to Seller Center - Shopee Ads Module FE is Conversions Rate.

","name":"broad_conversions","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"KRkzmXx"},{"description":"

item sold within 7 days after clicking on the ads. (item gets purchased from the clicked ads.)

","name":"direct_item_sold","sample":"123","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"CGbWXBM"},{"description":"

item sold within 7 days after clicking on the ads.(the item gets purchased as long as there are other items from the same shops got click.)

Please kindly note that the broad_conversions in the API reflected to Advertiser Platform is Conversion Rate.

","name":"broad_item_sold","sample":"123","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"djfRPdM"},{"description":"

Total sales generated from Ad over a certain time frame Typically 7 days. (item gets purchased from the clicked ads.)

","name":"direct_gmv","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"yJGaAYf"},{"description":"

Total sales generated from Ad over a certain time frame (the item gets purchased as long as there are other items from the same shops got click.)

","name":"broad_gmv","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"BKGXFAc"},{"description":"

Ad Expenditure

","name":"expense","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"EKwikmK"},{"description":"

(Cost Per Conversion) Ad's average cost per sales conversion

","name":"cost_per_conversion","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"fTtfMwi"},{"description":"

Ad GMV/Ad Expenditure. (item gets purchased from the clicked ads.)

","name":"direct_roas","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"KrKstMf"},{"description":"

Ad GMV/Ad Expenditure. (the item gets purchased as long as there are other items from the same shops got click.)

","name":"broad_roas","sample":"1.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"iKYfRiy"}]}]}
